raw_comment: This graph shows that if your parents went there you will have a higher chance to get admitted into the college. If your parents went there and you are in the top 98% you will get a 7% higher chance to get in.
ace_sentences: This graph shows a relationship between parental attendance and college admission.
If a person's parents went to the college, then the person has a higher chance to be admitted to the college.
If a person's parents went to the college and the person is in the top 98%, then the person has a 7% higher chance to be admitted to the college.
